00015 //
00016 // 
00017 // File:        CSR_Builder.h
00018 // Directory:   $TRUST_ROOT/src/Kernel/Math/Matrices
00019 // Version:     /main/6
00020 // 
00021 //
00022 #ifndef CSR_Builder_included
00023 #define CSR_Builder_included
00024 
00025 //
00026 //! This class is a helper to build CSR stored matrices
00027 class CSR_Builder
00028 {
00029 public:
00030   CSR_Builder();
00031   initialize(int nb_lines);
00032   inline void add_coeff(int line, int column, double coeff);
00033   build_matrix(Matrice_Bloc&);
00034 protected:
00035   int nb_lines_;
00036 // List data contains groups of 2 integers like this:
00037 // column, next_index, column, next_index, ...
00038 // column is the parameter passed to add_coeff
00039 // next_index is the group number of the next coefficient on the same line
00040 // or -1 if this is the last coefficient.
00041 // if not -1, the next group is
00042 // column     = list_data_[2*next_index]
00043 // next_index = list_data_[2*next_index+1]
00044 // the coefficient is at coeff_data_[next_index]
00045 // The first coefficient on line "l" is at list_head[l]
00046   ArrOfInt list_head_;
00047 // list_tail_[l] = -1 if the line "l" is empty, otherwise, gives the index
00048 // of the last "next_index" on the line (we have list_data_[2*tail+1]=-1)
00049   ArrOfInt list_tail_;
00050   ArrOfInt list_data_;
00051   ArrOfDouble coeff_data_;
00052 };
00053 
00054 inline void CSR_Builder::add_coeff(int line, int column, double coeff)
00055 {
00056   assert(line >= 0 && line < nb_lines_);
00057 
00058 // We put the new coefficient here:
00059   const int n = coeff_data_.size_array();
00060   assert(list_data_.size_array() == n*2); //!< mixing calls with and without "coeff" is forbidden
00061   list_data_.resize_array(n*2+2);
00062   list_data_[n*2] = column;
00063   list_data_[n*2+1] = -1; //!< new end of list
00064   coeff_data_.append_array(coeff);
00065 
00066   const int tail = list_tail_[line];
00067   if (tail < 0)
00068     {
00069 // this line is empty, initialize list_head_
00070       list_head_[line] = n;
00071     }
00072   else
00073     {
00074 // update the last next_index of the line:
00075       list_data_[2*tail+1] = n;
00076     }
00077   list_tail_[line] = n;
00078 }
00079 
00080 inline void CSR_Builder::add_coeff(int line, int column)
00081 {
00082   assert(line >= 0 && line < nb_lines_);
00083   assert(coeff_data_.size_array() == 0); //!< mixing calls with and without "coeff" is forbidden We put the new coefficient here:
00084 //
00085   const int n = list_data_.size_array() / 2;
00086   list_data_.resize_array(n*2+2);
00087   list_data_[n*2] = column;
00088   list_data_[n*2+1] = -1; //!< new end of list
00089 
00090   const int tail = list_tail_[line];
00091   if (tail < 0)
00092     {
00093 // this line is empty, initialize list_head_
00094       list_head_[line] = n;
00095     }
00096   else
00097     {
00098 // update the last next_index of the line:
00099       list_data_[2*tail+1] = n;
00100     }
00101   list_tail_[line] = n;
00102 }
00103 #endif
